p: Referencing to the law of conservation of energy which states that "Energy cannot be created nor be destroyed", sound waves as a form of mechanical energy can be converted to other forms such as heat energy or electric energy through choosing the suitable approach of conversion [ 7]. Noise can be described as unwanted sound waves [ 8] are originated from human activities, especially urbanization and the development of transport systems. Though the urban population is much more affected by such pollution, small towns along side roads or industrial areas are also affected by this pollution [ 9]. The source of most outdoor noise worldwide is transportation systems including roads, flyways, and rail traffic which are called traffic noise where people living in urban city complained about the noise from buses, trains, heavy trucks, motor-cycles, airplanes and pneumatic drills. These sources produced noise ranged from 85 to 120 dB [ 10].
